text: Vully-les-Lacs is a municipality in the district of Broye-Vully in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. ==History== The municipality was created on July 1, 2011 merger of the former municipalities of Bellerive, Constantine, Chabrey, Montmagny, Mur, Vallamand and Villars-le-Grand.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 17 February 2011 ==Villages== Salavaux, Cotterd, Bellerive, Constantine, Chabrey, Montmagny, Mur, Vallamand, Vallamand-Dessous and Villars-le-Grand. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website Category:Municipalities in Broye-Vully Category:2011 establishments in Switzerland
title: Vully-les-Lacs
